title: The Oldest Gun in the West
description: Duke Montana’s triumphant return to the silver screen. They thought he was too old for this. They thought wrong.
quote: I ain’t on the side of the Indians, I’m on the side of right.
altHero: Duke Montana in full cowboy garb
alt2: Duke on a rope bridge pointing a gun
alt3: Duke in town facing off with a sheriff
alt4: Duke talking in some high grass
